meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by pantheism.
meanings.sent1: The pantheistic view sees divinity in all things around us.
meanings.sent2: She embraced a pantheistic belief that nature itself is divine.
meanings.sent3: The pantheistic approach to spirituality values the interconnectedness of all living beings.
meanings.sent4: In her pantheistic mindset, every tree and river held a piece of the divine.
meanings.sent5: The pantheistic philosophy teaches us to find beauty and wonder in the world.
